Islamic State-Taliban conflict.Date: 2 February 2015 - present | (7 years, 1 month and 3 days)
Islamic State-Taliban conflict.Status: Ongoing | Initial Taliban victories in the battles of Darzab and Nangarhar | Collapse of the Islamic State stronghold in eastern Afghanistan in 2019 | IS-KP regains strength in 2021, retaking territory in eastern Afghanistan
Islamic State-Taliban conflict: Part of the continuous Afghanistan conflict

Belligerents.Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan | Taliban: Islamic State | Khorasan Province | IS central command | Mullah Dadullah Front | Fidai Mahaz | High Council of the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan | (HCIEA) | Supported by | Islamic Republic of Afghanistan | (allegedly, until 2021)
